response.original_title: The Spartan Chronicles: Decent into Depravity
response.overview: In a post-apocalyptic world of chaos, elite soldiers called SPARTANS help keep peace in the world. But though the world has changed, human nature has not, and there are still plenty of psychopaths around who would love to capture, molest and murder an attractive Spartan warrior.... and consume his meaty muscles! In this depraved tale, A man jealous of the Spartans, imagines what it would be like to kill a young Spartan in a heroic battle. He then lures a young Spartan to his house, where he drugs him, strangles him, poses with his body for photographs, before butchering him and eating him for dinner!!
response.title: The Spartan Chronicles: Decent into Depravity
